Matthew L. OLson

The first AI PhD in the USA

Resume CV

About Me

I'm Matthew L. Olson, a pioneering Artificial Intelligence researcher and the first official AI PhD recipient from Oregon State University (view my thesis). My work primarily orbits the realm of machine learning, with a special focus on explainability and scientific applications.
My research journey has been marked by contributions across diverse domains of machine learning, including computer vision, natural language processing, and scientific machine learning. I am particularly fascinated by the intersection of deep learning, transformers, and generative models.
